physical_appearance:The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It is rectangular and it features a group of ten people. All of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. There is a boy
 who is standing at the left hand side of the photograph
 while the rest are adults. All the adults
 except for one man at the right hand side of the photograph at the back row
 are wearing their military uniforms. The background of the photograph shows a building
